title: Mr. Attaf receives a phone call from his Mauritanian counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf received a phone call from his brother the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Mauritanians Abroad, Mr. Mohamed Salem Ould Merzouk who congratulated him on his appointment as head of Algerian diplomacy.

The two Ministers referred on this occasion to the relations of brotherhood and cooperation between Algeria and Mauritania, welcoming the efforts made to build a strong partnership mutually beneficial to the two countries and peoples and strengthening political coordination on regional and international issues of common interest, in implementation of the guidelines of the Presidents of the two countries.
